import { Box, Table, Thead, Tbody, Tr, Th, Td } from "@chakra-ui/react"; const Home = () => { const startTime = new Date(0, 0, 0, 7, 0, 0); // Start at 7:00 const endTime = new Date(0, 0, 0, 22, 0, 0); // End at 22:00 const halfHour = 30 * 60 * 1000; // Half hour in milliseconds const timeSlots = []; for (let time = startTime; time <= endTime; time = new Date(time.getTime() + halfHour)) { const startMinutes = time.getMinutes() === 0 ? "00" : time.getMinutes(); const endMinutes = startMinutes === "00" ? "30" : "00"; const endHour = endMinutes === "00" ? time.getHours() + 1 : time.getHours(); const timeSlot = `${time.getHours()}:${startMinutes}-${endHour}:${endMinutes}`; timeSlots.push(timeSlot); } return ( timeSlots.map() {/* */}
